amendment.description: To provide additional funding for juvenile mentoring programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3220 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3220 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S12711-12712; text: CR S12712) To provide additional funding for juvenile mentoring programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3220 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Menendez.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3220 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
